subject: Doping (Sports)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: A Jamaican disciplinary panel barred the former 100-meter world-record holder Asafa Powell from the sport for 18 months after he tested positive for a banned stimulant last June.
snippet: A Jamaican disciplinary panel barred the former 100-meter world-record holder Asafa Powell from the sport for 18 months after he tested positive for a banned stimulant last June.
